00136 #ifndef _SYS_TYPES_H_
00137 
00138 #ifndef _SYS_VIRTUAL_TYPES_H_
00139 #define _SYS_VIRTUAL_TYPES_H_
00140 
00141 
00142 #ifdef __NUT_EMULATION__
00143 //  on an emulation platform, we need to have both
00144 //              a) the native types headers and libs and
00145 #include <sys/types_orig.h>
00146 //              b) the additional nut os header and implementation
00147 
00149 typedef unsigned long long u_longlong;
00150 typedef long long longlong;
00151 
00152 #endif
00153 
00154 #ifndef _SYS_TYPES_H
00155 #define _SYS_TYPES_H_
00156 #endif
00157 
00163 #ifdef __cplusplus
00164 extern "C" {
00165 #endif
00166 
00167 #include <compiler.h>
00168 
00169 
00174 
00175 #ifndef NUTMEM_ALIGNMENT
00176 #if defined(__avr__)
00177 #define NUTMEM_ALIGNMENT        1
00178 #elif defined(__ARM__)
00179 #define NUTMEM_ALIGNMENT        4
00180 #else
00181 #define NUTMEM_ALIGNMENT        sizeof(int)
00182 #endif
00183 #endif
00184 
00188 #define NUTMEM_BOTTOM_ALIGN(s)  ((s) & ~(NUTMEM_ALIGNMENT - 1))
00189 
00193 #define NUTMEM_TOP_ALIGN(s)     NUTMEM_BOTTOM_ALIGN((s + (NUTMEM_ALIGNMENT - 1)))
00194 
00195 
00196 #ifndef __NUT_EMULATION__
00197 
00203     typedef unsigned char u_char;
00204 
00206     typedef unsigned short u_short;
00207 
00209 /* Warning: size is highly architecture/compiler dependant! */
00210     typedef unsigned int u_int;
00211 
00213     typedef unsigned long u_long;
00214 
00216     typedef unsigned long long u_longlong;
00217 
00218 #endif                          /* unix emulation */
00219 
00221     typedef void *HANDLE;
00222 
00233 #if defined(__AVR__)
00234     typedef unsigned char ureg_t;
00235 #elif defined(__arm__)
00236     typedef unsigned short ureg_t;
00237 #elif defined(__H8300__) || defined(__H8300H__) || defined(__H8300S__)
00238     typedef unsigned short ureg_t;
00239 #elif defined(__m68k__)
00240     typedef unsigned short ureg_t;
00241 #else
00242     typedef unsigned short ureg_t;
00243 #endif
00244 
00250 #if defined(__AVR__)
00251     typedef unsigned char reg_t;
00252 #elif defined(__arm__)
00253     typedef unsigned short reg_t;
00254 #elif defined(__H8300__) || defined(__H8300H__) || defined(__H8300S__)
00255     typedef unsigned short reg_t;
00256 #elif defined(__m68k__)
00257     typedef unsigned short reg_t;
00258 #else
00259     typedef unsigned short reg_t;
00260 #endif
00261 
00268 #if defined(__AVR__)
00269     typedef unsigned short uptr_t;
00270 #elif defined(__GNUC__)
00271 /*
00272  * For remaining MCUs GCC is assumed where __PTRDIFF_TYPE__ macro is defined
00273  */
00274     typedef unsigned __PTRDIFF_TYPE__ uptr_t;
00275 #else
00276     typedef unsigned int uptr_t;
00277 #endif
00278 
00279 #define __byte_swap2(val)           \
00280     ((((val) & 0xff) << 8) |        \
00281      (((val) & 0xff00) >> 8))
00282 
00283 #define __byte_swap4(val)           \
00284     ((((val) & 0xff) << 24) |       \
00285      (((val) & 0xff00) << 8) |      \
00286      (((val) & 0xff0000) >> 8) |    \
00287      (((val) & 0xff000000) >> 24))
00288 
00289 #if defined(__GNUC__) && defined(__AVR__)
00290 /*
00291  * Conversion of 16 bit value to network order.
00292  */
00293 #undef __byte_swap2
00294     static inline uint16_t __byte_swap2(uint16_t val) {
00295         asm volatile ("mov __tmp_reg__, %A0\n\t" "mov %A0, %B0\n\t" "mov %B0, __tmp_reg__\n\t":"=r" (val)
00296                       :"0"(val)
00297             );
00298          return val;
00299     }
00300 /*
00301  * Conversion of 32 bit value to network order.
00302  */
00303 #undef __byte_swap4
00304     static inline uint32_t __byte_swap4(uint32_t val) {
00305         asm volatile ("mov __tmp_reg__, %A0\n\t"
00306                       "mov %A0, %D0\n\t"
00307                       "mov %D0, __tmp_reg__\n\t" "mov __tmp_reg__, %B0\n\t" "mov %B0, %C0\n\t" "mov %C0, __tmp_reg__\n\t":"=r" (val)
00308                       :"0"(val)
00309             );
00310         return val;
00311     }
00312 #endif                          /* #if defined(__GCC__) && defined(__AVR__) */
00313 
00314 
00315 #ifndef __NUT_EMULATION__
00316     
00320 #ifndef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00321 #define htons(x) __byte_swap2(x)
00322 #else
00323 #define htons(x) (x)
00324 #endif
00325     
00329 #ifndef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00330 #define htonl(x) __byte_swap4(x)
00331 #else
00332 #define htonl(x) (x)
00333 #endif
00334 
00338 #ifndef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00339 #define ntohs(x) __byte_swap2(x)
00340 #else
00341 #define ntohs(x) (x)
00342 #endif
00343 
00347 #ifndef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00348 #define ntohl(x) __byte_swap4(x)
00349 #else
00350 #define ntohl(x) (x)
00351 #endif
00352 
00353 #endif /* network to host byte conversion */
00354 
00357 #ifdef __cplusplus
00358 }
00359 #endif
00360 
00361 #endif                          /* #ifndef _SYS_VIRTUAL_TYPES_H_ */
00362 
00363 #endif                          /* #ifndef _SYS_TYPES_H_ */
